flawed_nl_solution:
It took 8*0.25=<<8*0.25=2>>2 years longer to go from chief to master chief than to get chief
So it takes him 8+2=<<8+2=10>>10 years to become a master chief
That means he took 10+8=<<10+8=16>>16 years to reach master chief from enlisting
So he was in the military for 16+10=<<16+10=26>>26 years
So he was 26+18=<<26+18=44>>44 when he retired
#### 44

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
